# GitHub Repository Information

## Repository Description (Short)

Use this for the GitHub repository description (appears at the top of the repo):

```
Enterprise-grade .NET 8.0 API demonstrating Clean Architecture, DDD, JWT auth, CI/CD with Azure Pipelines, Docker, comprehensive observability, and production-ready patterns
```

## Alternative Shorter Version

```
Production-ready .NET 8.0 API with Clean Architecture, DDD, JWT auth, Docker, CI/CD, and enterprise patterns
```

## How to Add Description and Topics

1. Go to your GitHub repository: https://github.com/DanteTuraSalvador/TestNest.CleanArchitecture
2. Click the ⚙️ gear icon next to "About" (top right of the page)
3. In the "Description" field, paste one of the descriptions above
4. In the "Topics" field, add the tags listed above (select from suggestions or type them)
5. Optional: Add a website URL if you have documentation hosted elsewhere
6. Click "Save changes"

## Social Preview Image (Optional)

Consider creating a social preview image (1280x640px) that shows:
- Project name: TestNest.CleanArchitecture
- Tagline: "Enterprise .NET API with Clean Architecture"
- Key features: Clean Architecture, DDD, Docker, CI/CD
- Tech stack logos: .NET, C#, Docker, Azure

Upload this in: Settings → General → Social preview
